name: fizztask
description: FizzTask - AI-powered task management from emails

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend/build/* backend/public/
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.railway-build: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: FizzTask Team
